experience.title: Founder
experience.description: Crown Capital Partners, Where elite investments converge with unrivalled expertise:At Crown, we curate exclusive opportunities in the realm of luxury assets, allowing discerning investors to diversify their portfolios with high-value alternatives. Our bespoke services cater to connoisseurs and collectors passionate about:Fine Whisky and Rare WinesExquisite Art PiecesCoveted CollectiblesOpulent Real EstateBespoke JewelleryExperience the pinnacle of alternative investments with Crown Capital Partners, your gateway to a world of refined wealth management.We are proud to unveil our prestigious USD 100 Million Luxembourg-registered SICAV Fund, a bespoke investment vehicle meticulously crafted to harness the burgeoning potential of premium whisky casks. This exclusive opportunity aims to deliver an impressive 18% gross annual return, offering discerning investors a chance to partake in the time-honored tradition of whisky maturation while potentially reaping substantial financial rewards.

experience.title: Director
experience.description: Pacific Spirits, established in 1978 in New Delhi, is a premier business group specializing in liquor, packaging, and agricultural products. With over 23 years of experience in the Indian beverage industry, we've consistently led the market in innovation and quality.Key Highlights:Entered the Indian beer market in 1994, establishing a state-of-the-art brewery in partnership with Carlsberg's subsidiary, Danbrew AS of Denmark.Pioneered several firsts in India, including the introduction of canned beer and foreign beer brands.Held prestigious partnerships, including:Licensee for Stroh's BeerAll-India Franchisee for Cadbury Schweppes (since 1995)Contract manufacturer for Kingfisher, India's leading beer brandSuccessfully sold a stake in our brewery to Heineken India in 2018, marking a significant business milestone.Leveraged our extensive industry experience to pivot towards importing and selling European beers in India.Diversified our portfolio through investments in startups and an agricultural initiative with IFFCO in 2020.Currently developing a craft brewery to launch a new line of beers and ciders, continuing our tradition of innovation in the Indian beverage market.Our journey reflects a commitment to quality, innovation, and strategic growth in the dynamic Indian beverage industry.
